solution_line_template: First find the total time it takes Maryann to rescue one friend: {cheap_handcuffs_time} minutes + {expensive_handcuffs_time} minutes = <<{cheap_handcuffs_time}+{expensive_handcuffs_time}={time_per_friend}>>{time_per_friend} minutes

Then multiply the time to save one friend by the number of friends Maryann needs to save: {time_per_friend} minutes/friend * {num_friends} friends = <<{time_per_friend}*{num_friends}={total_time}>>{total_time} minutes
